name: Sterntaler
overview: A catch-it style game published in 64'er 1991/07. Collect the star money. Green gives ten points, red gives 50 and blue even 100 points. However, be careful of the falling asteroids. If 5000 points have been accumulated you will reach the bonus round where you are invulnerable. High scores are tracked so you can determine the best of the day.
